page.title: 18THE VILLAGE OF EATHORPE
page.content: The {Population }has fallen , a little. It used to be 150 people but now it is only 135. Eathorpe and Wappenbury's population is always recorded together. There is no community life as everyone is too busy. The improvements that have come to the village have made some changes. The improvements include 3 buses a day and electrity instead of oil lamps. When there was village life everyone had children and no one was too busy for the community life where as now there is no spirit and all the community life has gone. The nearest {Doctor }used to be at Marton but now it is Stretton which is 4 to 5 miles away.In recent years everyone in the village has changed and only 2 people still remain from about 10 years ago.
